title: Custom Oak Box for Raw and Graded Cards for Sale
author: rgpete

posts.post_title: Custom Oak Box for Raw and Graded Cards for Sale
posts.post_content:
Specifications: 
Exterior Dimensions 7-1/2" wide x 9-5/8" long x 4-1/2" high
Interior Dimensions 6-1/2" wide x 8-5/8" long x 3-1/2" high

Card Capacity:
410 more or less Top Loaders for 1-5/32" x 2" Cards Tobacco,Candy and Strip Cards
208 more or less 3"x 4" Top Loaders on side
Graded 25-38 Holders on side, depending on thickness of holder

Material: 1/2" Red Oak

Finish: Boiled Linseed Oil (Shown in Picture) or Red Oak Stain.

The Box will be built when ordered, please allow 4 to 6 weeks for completion. 

Cost $140.00 including shipping and handling
